Andrew F Schorr

Pixel pusher and keyboard masher extraordinaire at Tumblr.

I also like taking pictures.

Projects

  • Aframe CMS / Github

    Simple custom PHP CMS that exposes a public API, that powers my personal photo site (coming soon :)

  • BRDesign Associates / BRDesignassociates.com

    Custom site done for BRDesign Architecture firm. Running on Pyro CMS (PHP)

  • Olympus Marketing Site / Cameras.Olympus.com

    Global, localized, responsive website to support OMD product launch. Responsive across devices, built on top of Laravel Framework while at AKQA.

Around the Interwebs

  • SchorrEats / SchorrEats.com

    Restaurant rating review site built as birthday present for Mom :) Built on Angular and Node. Source code on Github.

  • CS in JS / Cs in JS

    Various algorithms and data structures in JS.

  • ThreeElevate / gHeight.afs35mm.com

    Google Maps API x ThreeJS Mashup that lets you pick two lat/long combos, and displays the elevation path across points on ThreeJS Canvas element. Source code available on Github.

  • Moodcastr / Moodcastr.com

    Soundcloud and wunderground API mashup to play songs based on your location / weather in the area combination. Source code on Github.

  • Canvas FireWorks / fireworks.afs35mm.com

    Simple Canvas experiment to mimic pixelated fireworks. Source code on Github.
